author: Kate Prince
title: Kylie Cosmetics Shamelessly Lures out Fans During Global Pandemic
description: Kylie Cosmetics is half price at Ulta, luring lipstick-loving losers to storm the stores when they reopen, no matter the cost. Make no mistake, it's not worth it. The post Kylie Cosmetics Shamelessly Lures out Fans During Global Pandemic appeared first on CCN…
content:
• Kylie Jenners cosmetics line has slashed prices in half at Ulta stores as part of Ultas 21 Days of Beauty in a deplorable move by the retailer.
  • Considering the global pandemic, it just goes to show that vapid beauty fans are still in the marke… [+2569 chars]
